wikitext.*:
'''''vomentienguo''''' is a [[Telerin]] word.<ref name=WJQ>{{WJ|Quendi}}, pp. 367, 407</ref>

[[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that it corresponds to the English phrase "of our meeting".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|articleurl=http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/telerin.htm|articlename=Telerin - the language of the Sea-elves|dated=|website=|accessed=3 February 2012}}</ref>

==Examples==

*''ēl sīla lūmena '''vomentienguo''''' ("A star shines upon the hour of the meeting of our ways")<ref name=WJQ/>
